liquid_edit.serialize_explanation: Each placement of the liquid will get its own number. ("Sample 1", "Sample 2", "Sample 3")

option.once: Once at the start of step

option_tooltip.always: Always aspirate with a fresh tip.
option_tooltip.once: Get one new tip to use for the whole step.
option_tooltip.perSource: Get a new tip when aspirating from a new source well. Keep tip for repeat aspirations from the same source well.
option_tooltip.perDest: Get a new tip when dispensing into a new destination well. Keep tip for repeat dispenses into the same destination well.
option_tooltip.never: Use same tip as the previous step.

options.true: Delay for an amount of time

subtitle.only_many_to_1: Only compatible with Many-to-1 well ratios
subtitle.incompatible_with_per_dest: Incompatible with "Per Destination Well" Change Tip setting
subtitle.incompatible_with_per_source: Incompatible with "Per Source Well" Change Tip setting
